text:
Indian shares fluctuated between gains and losses following weak trade in global equities over rising geopolitical concerns and as traders await cues from RBI’s monetary policy meet tomorrow.The S&P BSE Sensex slipped 0.1 percent to 28,411 while the NSE Nifty declined 0.1 percent as well to 8,787.






Here are the stocks moving the market:
title: Stocks Radar: ITC, Tata Steel, Titagarh Wagons And More
